1 #!/usr/bin/env python3
2 # -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
3 
4 """
5 @file maze_escape.py
6 @brief Localization and visualization node using laser scans and kNN.
7 
8 This ROS node estimates the robot position in a known occupancy grid map
9 by matching laser scan data against a kNN classifier trained on the map.
10 The estimated pose is published and visualized in real time.
11 """
12 
13 import rospy
14 import numpy as np
15 import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
16 import math
17 
18 from sensor_msgs.msg import LaserScan
19 from nav_msgs.srv import GetMap
20 from nav_msgs.msg import OccupancyGrid
21 from geometry_msgs.msg import PoseStamped, Quaternion
22 
23 from sklearn import neighbors
24 from sklearn.inspection import DecisionBoundaryDisplay
25 from matplotlib.colors import ListedColormap
26 
27 import tf.transformations as tft
28 
29 # Global scan storage (required by ROS callback)
30 
31 scan_data = None
32 pose_pub = None
33 
34 
35 # -----------------------------------------------------------
36 # ROS utilities
37 # -----------------------------------------------------------
38 
39 def init_ros():
40  """
41  @brief Initialize the ROS node.
42 
43  Creates the ROS node named @c mazeEscape and enables ROS logging.
44  This function must be called before any ROS communication is used.
45  """
46  rospy.init_node('mazeEscape', anonymous=True)
47  rospy.loginfo("Node started: mazeEscape")
48 
49 
50 def get_map() -> OccupancyGrid:
51  """
52  @brief Retrieve the static occupancy grid map.
53 
54  Waits for the @c /static_map service and requests the map.
55 
56  @return The received occupancy grid map.
57  """
58  rospy.wait_for_service('static_map')
59  get_map_srv = rospy.ServiceProxy('static_map', GetMap)
60  return get_map_srv().map
61 
62 
63 def scan_callback(msg: LaserScan):
64  """
65  @brief Process incoming laser scan data.
66 
67  Converts valid laser scan ranges from polar coordinates into
68  Cartesian coordinates in the robot frame and stores them globally.
69 
70  @param msg Incoming LaserScan message.
71  """
72  global scan_data
73 
74  angles = np.linspace(msg.angle_min, msg.angle_max, len(msg.ranges))
75  ranges = np.array(msg.ranges)
76 
77  valid = (ranges > msg.range_min) & (ranges < msg.range_max)
78  ranges = ranges[valid]
79  angles = angles[valid]
80 
81  xs = ranges * np.cos(angles)
82  ys = ranges * np.sin(angles)
83 
84  scan_data = np.vstack((xs, ys)).T
85 
86 
87 def publish_pose(robot_pose):
88  """
89  @brief Publish the estimated robot pose.
90 
91  Publishes the robot position as a PoseStamped message in the @c map
92  coordinate frame with zero orientation.
93 
94  @param robot_pose Tuple containing the robot position (x, y).
95  """
96  px, py = robot_pose
97 
98  msg = PoseStamped()
99  msg.header.stamp = rospy.Time.now()
100  msg.header.frame_id = "map"
101 
102  msg.pose.position.x = px
103  msg.pose.position.y = py
104  msg.pose.position.z = 0.0
105 
106  quat = tft.quaternion_from_euler(0, 0, 0)
107  msg.pose.orientation = Quaternion(*quat)
108 
109  pose_pub.publish(msg)
110 
111 
112 # -----------------------------------------------------------
113 # Coordinate transforms
114 # -----------------------------------------------------------
115 
116 def map_to_world(mx, my, rec_map):
117  """
118  @brief Convert map indices to world coordinates.
119 
120  @param mx Map x-index (column).
121  @param my Map y-index (row).
122  @param rec_map Occupancy grid map metadata.
123  @return World coordinates (x, y) in meters.
124  """
125  res = rec_map.info.resolution
126  ox = rec_map.info.origin.position.x
127  oy = rec_map.info.origin.position.y
128  return mx * res + ox, my * res + oy
129 
130 
131 def world_to_map(wx, wy, rec_map):
132  """
133  @brief Convert world coordinates to map indices.
134 
135  @param wx World x-coordinate in meters.
136  @param wy World y-coordinate in meters.
137  @param rec_map Occupancy grid map metadata.
138  @return Map indices (mx, my).
139  """
140  res = rec_map.info.resolution
141  ox = rec_map.info.origin.position.x
142  oy = rec_map.info.origin.position.y
143  return (wx - ox) / res, (wy - oy) / res
144 
145 
146 def transform_scan(scan_points, robot_pose):
147  """
148  @brief Transform laser scan points into the world frame.
149 
150  Applies a planar rotation and translation based on the robot pose.
151 
152  @param scan_points Nx2 array of scan points in robot frame.
153  @param robot_pose Tuple (x, y, theta) describing robot pose.
154  @return Nx2 array of scan points in world coordinates.
155  """
156  x, y, theta = robot_pose
157  c, s = np.cos(theta), np.sin(theta)
158  R = np.array([[c, -s], [s, c]])
159  return (R @ scan_points.T).T + np.array([x, y])
160 
161 
162 # -----------------------------------------------------------
163 # Localization logic
164 # -----------------------------------------------------------
165 
166 def push_away(scan_points, distance=0.10):
167  """
168  @brief Push laser scan points outward from the robot.
169 
170  Helps avoid numerical issues caused by points too close to the origin.
171 
172  @param scan_points Nx2 array of laser scan points.
173  @param distance Distance to push points outward in meters.
174  @return Modified scan points.
175  """
176  r = np.linalg.norm(scan_points, axis=1)
177  r[r == 0] = 1e-6
178  return scan_points * ((r + distance) / r)[:, None]
179 
180 
181 def localize_robot(scan_points, knn, free_cells):
182  """
183  @brief Estimate the robot position using scan-to-map matching.
184 
185  Evaluates translated laser scans against a kNN map classifier and
186  selects the position with the highest number of wall hits.
187 
188  @param scan_points Laser scan points in robot frame.
189  @param knn Trained kNN classifier.
190  @param free_cells List of possible robot positions.
191  @return Estimated robot position (x, y).
192  """
193  best_score = -1
194  best_pose = None
195 
196  scan_points = push_away(scan_points)
197 
198  for rx, ry in free_cells:
199  transformed = scan_points + np.array([rx, ry])
200  predictions = knn.predict(transformed)
201  score = np.sum(predictions == 1)
202 
203  if score > best_score:
204  best_score = score
205  best_pose = (rx, ry)
206 
207  return best_pose
208 
209 
210 # -----------------------------------------------------------
211 # Map & ML preparation
212 # -----------------------------------------------------------
213 
214 def build_map_array(rec_map):
215  """
216  @brief Convert an occupancy grid into a NumPy array.
217 
218  @param rec_map Received occupancy grid map.
219  @return 2D NumPy array representation of the map.
220  """
221  w = rec_map.info.width
222  h = rec_map.info.height
223  return np.array(rec_map.data, dtype=np.int8).reshape((h, w))
224 
225 
226 def prepare_knn_data(map_array, rec_map):
227  """
228  @brief Generate training data for the kNN classifier.
229 
230  Converts each map cell into world coordinates and labels it as
231  free space or obstacle.
232 
233  @param map_array 2D occupancy grid array.
234  @param rec_map Occupancy grid map metadata.
235  @return Tuple (X, y, free_cells).
236  """
237  h, w = map_array.shape
238  X, y, free_cells = [], [], []
239 
240  for i in range(h):
241  for j in range(w):
242  wx, wy = map_to_world(j, i, rec_map)
243  label = 1 if map_array[i, j] > 50 else 0
244 
245  X.append([wx, wy])
246  y.append(label)
247 
248  if label == 0:
249  free_cells.append((wx, wy))
250 
251  return np.array(X), np.array(y), free_cells
252 
253 
254 def train_knn(X, y):
255  """
256  @brief Train a k-Nearest Neighbors classifier.
257 
258  @param X World coordinates of map cells.
259  @param y Occupancy labels.
260  @return Trained kNN classifier.
261  """
262  knn = neighbors.KNeighborsClassifier(n_neighbors=1)
263  knn.fit(X, y)
264  rospy.loginfo("kNN model fitted successfully.")
265  return knn
266 
267 
268 # -----------------------------------------------------------
269 # Visualization
270 # -----------------------------------------------------------
271 
272 def visualize_knn(knn, X):
273  """
274  @brief Visualize the learned kNN decision boundary.
275 
276  Displays free space and obstacles as classified by the model.
277  """
278  colours = ListedColormap(["#d3d3d3", "#00008b"])
279 
280  plt.rcParams['figure.figsize'] = [5, 5]
281  _, ax = plt.subplots()
282 
283  DecisionBoundaryDisplay.from_estimator(
284  knn,
285  X,
286  cmap=colours,
287  ax=ax,
288  response_method="predict",
289  plot_method="pcolormesh",
290  shading="auto",
291  xlabel="X [m]",
292  ylabel="Y [m]"
293  )
294 
295  ax.set_title("Fitted kNN Map Model")
296  plt.show(block=False)
297  plt.pause(2)
298 
299 
300 def visualization_loop(map_array, rec_map, knn, free_cells):
301  """
302  @brief Main localization and visualization loop.
303 
304  Continuously estimates the robot pose, publishes it, and visualizes
305  laser scans and robot position on the map.
306  """
307  plt.ion()
308  fig, ax = plt.subplots(figsize=(8, 8))
309 
310  robot_pose = (0.0, 0.0, 0.0)
311 
312  while not rospy.is_shutdown():
313  if scan_data is None:
314  continue
315 
316  robot_xy = localize_robot(scan_data, knn, free_cells)
317  publish_pose(robot_xy)
318 
319  scan_world = transform_scan(scan_data, (robot_xy[0], robot_xy[1], 0.0))
320  xs_map, ys_map = world_to_map(scan_world[:, 0], scan_world[:, 1], rec_map)
321 
322  ax.clear()
323  ax.imshow(map_array, cmap='gray', origin='lower')
324  ax.scatter(xs_map, ys_map, c='r', s=8, label='LaserScan')
325  ax.scatter(*world_to_map(robot_xy[0], robot_xy[1], rec_map),
326  c='b', s=60, marker='X', label='Robot')
327 
328  ax.set_title("Map + LaserScan")
329  ax.legend()
330  plt.pause(0.1)
331 
332  plt.ioff()
333  plt.show()
334 
335 
336 # -----------------------------------------------------------
337 # Main
338 # -----------------------------------------------------------
339 
340 def main():
341  """
342  @brief Program entry point.
343 
344  Initializes ROS, loads the map, trains the classifier, sets up
345  communication, and starts the visualization loop.
346  """
347  global pose_pub
348 
349  init_ros()
350 
351  rec_map = get_map()
352  rospy.loginfo("Map received")
353 
354  map_array = build_map_array(rec_map)
355 
356  X, y, free_cells = prepare_knn_data(map_array, rec_map)
357  knn = train_knn(X, y)
358 
359  visualize_knn(knn, X)
360 
361  rospy.Subscriber('/scan', LaserScan, scan_callback)
362  pose_pub = rospy.Publisher("/robot_pose", PoseStamped, queue_size=10)
363 
364  rospy.loginfo("Subscribed to /scan")
365  visualization_loop(map_array, rec_map, knn, free_cells)
366 
367 
368 if __name__ == "__main__":
369  main()
